name: Rocket Wars
description: Fast-paced local multi-player game packed with action. Destroy your friends with all sorts of different weapons and power-ups across multiple game modes!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 1.66 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000/2000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended
